src:
大阪ガスが悲願の初優勝　日本生命との「大阪対決」を制す

04 Nov 2019

　「社会人野球日本選手権・決勝、大阪ガス４－１日本生命」（４日、京セラドーム大阪）
　阪神・能見篤史投手や近本光司外野手らが所属していた大阪ガスが「大阪対決」を制し、２３度目の出場で初優勝を果たした。
　大阪ガスは二回に２点を奪うと、三回には「２番・遊撃」で出場した楽天１位指名の小深田大翔内野手が、投手内野安打で出塁し、１死二、三塁からの右犠飛で３点目のホームに生還。堅実で安定した守備も見せ、攻守で勝利に貢献した。
　投げては先発した阪本大樹投手が、日本生命打線を相手に要所を締め、９回７安打１失点の完投勝利。阪神・能見を擁した０４年以来４度目の決勝戦での悲願成就となり、ダイヤモンド旗を手にした。
text:
Osaka Gas wins the long-cherished first victory, "Osaka Showdown" with Nippon Life

04 Nov 2019

"Japanese Baseball Championship for the Professionals, Final, Osaka Gas 4-1 Nippon Life" (4th, Kyocera Dome Osaka)
Osaka Gas, to which pitchers Hanshin and Atsushi Nomi, and Koji Chikamoto outfielder belonged, won the “Osaka Showdown” and won their first victory in their 23rd appearance.
When Osaka Gas took 2 points in 2 times, Daisho Kofuda, the first-ranked optimist in the opera, who participated in “No. 2 / Attack” in the 3rd, came up with a pitcher Uchino hit, and 2 deaths and 3 bases Returned to the 3rd home with a right sacrificial flight. He also showed solid and stable defense and contributed to the victory through offense and defense.
When throwing, the starting pitcher, Daiki Sakamoto, tightened the key points against the Nippon Life batting line and won a total of 9 hits, 7 hits and 1 run. In 2004, when Hanshin and Nomi were held, the fourth round of finals was fulfilled and the diamond flag was handed.
